titles.title: A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that pediatric nurse practitioner or pediatric clinical nurse specialist services are covered under part B of Medicare and are a mandatory benefit under Medicaid.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends titles XVIII (Medicare) and XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage for pediatric nurse practitioner or pediatric clinical nurse specialist services under Medicaid and part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of Medicare.
